name: Battlefield: Bad Company 2 - Vietnam
description:
Battlefield: Bad Company 2 - Vietnam is an action-shooter game developed by Electronic Arts DICE and Electronic Arts Digital Illusions Creative Entertainment. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Electronic Arts. Battlefield: Bad Company 2 - Vietnam has a Metascore of 86, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Battlefield: Bad Company 2 - Vietnam on PC, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. You can purchase the game on Steam and Xbox 360 Store.
Joel Eriksson and Mikael Karlsson scored the game.
developers: Electronic Arts Digital Illusions Creative Entertainment
